casebody.data:
Hilda T. KENNEDY, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
Frederic A. POLLOCK, Defendant. M-1303/1304 September Term 2017
080993 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 15, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of Hilda T. Kennedy and John F. Kennedy for leave to file a motion for leave to appeal as within time (M-1303) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal (M-1304) is denied.
